name: Secret Of Violet Dungeon
description:
Once upon a time, an evil spirit killed an old wizard. He lived in a dungeon, and everyone who came to him in the dungeon turned into ghosts turned into ghosts, so you have to resist the hacking of the ghost and collect all 5 keys to get out of the dungeon.

Сontrols: 

WASD/Arrows - Move

Creators:

Music: Soup Girl (https://soundcloud.com/its_soupgirl)

Graphics: 2077#3345
